review_data.title: OK Italian
review_data.content: This is a casual Italian restaurant with simple fare: pick your pasta and your sauce. They have pizzas as well. The wine selection is very limited. Table service was fine. The kitchen was a bit slow. Portions are ample.

review_data.title: Pleasant and tasty
